result.arabic_text: إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ عَٰلِمُ غَيۡبِ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِۚ إِنَّهُۥ عَلِيمُۢ بِذَاتِ ٱلصُّدُورِ
result.translation: Mu vy’ukuri Imana Allah, Irazi neza ibinyegejwe ibiremwa mu majuru n’isi, ni Yo mu vy’ukuri, Izi neza ibinyegejwe mu mishaha y’ibiremwa[3].
result.footnotes: [3] Nko kugira amakenga mu mushaha w’umuntu mu kwemera isengwa ry’Imana Imwe Rudende Allah, canke mu kwemera Intumwa Muhamadi (nyakugira amahoro n’impuhwe z’Imana Allah), canke mu kutubahiriza amabwirizwa ku bitari ivyo.
